definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
abbr. for Ukraine 烏克蘭|乌克兰[Wu1 ke4 lan2]/surname Wu

sentences.english: The IDC has a more uniform work function distribution than an oxide cathode.
sentences.chinese: 氧化物陰極的逸出功分佈比鋇鎢陰極更不均勻。

sentences.english: It provides higher abrasion resistance compared to tungsten carbide at the expense of some toughness.
sentences.chinese: 它提供了更高的耐磨性比鎢在硬質合金犧牲一些韌性。

sentences.english: Ternary tungsten-tellurite glass system was researched in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 研究了摻鉺鎢碲酸鹽玻璃的吸收光譜和熒光光譜。

sentences.english: Shaker concentrate containing a large number of sulfide ore, floating sulfur before floating scheelite.
sentences.chinese: 搖牀精礦含有大量的硫化礦，浮白鎢之前先浮硫。

sentences.english: The enrichment and recovery of tantalum and niobium through acid leaching and sodium alkali fusing from tungsten residue is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了用酸浸與鈉鹼熔融法從鎢渣中富集和回收鉭鈮。

sentences.english: The present invention involves bilayers that include cesium tungsten oxide as an infrared absorbing agent.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及包含作爲紅外線吸收劑的氧化銫鎢的雙層。

sentences.english: Ultrasonic testing technology for high-density tungsten alloy parts was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹高密度鎢基合金部件的超聲檢測技術。

sentences.english: The results show that Cu solubilizes in W and the substitutional solid solution is formed.
sentences.chinese: 結果發現，銅固溶在鎢中，並形成了置換固溶體。

sentences.english: This paper reports a CMOS compatible tungsten micro-hotplate.
sentences.chinese: 本文設計了一種與標準CMOS工藝兼容的鎢微熱板。

sentences.english: Erbium ion-doped tungstentellurite glass was fabricated and characterized by absorption spectrum and fluorescence spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 研究了摻鉺鎢碲酸鹽玻璃的吸收光譜和熒光光譜。

sentences.english: Characteristics of Scandate cathodes with Scandia doped tungsten bodies have been investigated in this work.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究具有氧化鈧摻雜鎢基體鈧酸鹽陰極的性能。

sentences.english: Multi-layered space plates of aluminum alloy penetrated by a tungsten sphere is experimentally investigated.
sentences.chinese: 進行了鎢合金球侵徹多層等間隔硬鋁靶的實驗研究。

sentences.english: Technology survey and development tendency investigation on tantalum-niobium hydrometallurgical extraction;
sentences.chinese: 研究了用酸浸與鈉鹼熔融法從鎢渣中富集和回收鉭鈮。

sentences.english: The deformation feature and the mechanism of these biphase W alloys have been also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文還討論了兩相鎢合金的形變特點和形變機制。

sentences.english: Experiment on corrosion resistance of W based alloy in liquid Al alloy was conduced.
sentences.chinese: 敘述了鎢基合金在鋁合金液中的抗蝕性試驗情況。

sentences.english: The experimental results show that scandia distributed evenly on the surface of tungsten particles.
sentences.chinese: 實驗結果表明，氧化鈧均勻分佈在鎢顆粒表面。

definition: a long narrow vessel with two masts
to pace back and forth/to hesitate/to waver
limited (of talent or ability)/(archaic) solid wheel (without spokes)
operculum (Latin: little lid)/a covering flap (in various branches of anatomy)
to raise/to lift/to pretend/counterfeit/unyielding/variant of 矯|矫[jiao3]/to correct
